extraData: TARGET feywild:spring_pixie ACTION use TIMES 2 USING minecraft:cake
name: Cakes
text: Hey it's you!  You have to taste these red bubbles of sweetness! /nSooo good! -The little faerie tries to stuff your face with berries.- /nAaaw now they are all gone... /nMaybe I shouldn't have given the last ones to you.. /nYou owe me! Now it's your turn to g&make me g&something g&tasty! /nA cake! No, g&TWO g&cakes!
